title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8111.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8111.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) US Route 11
between the southbound IR 81 exit ramp and a point 0.5+- mile south of the
southbound entrance ramp to IR 81 (Northeast Great Dane Terminal) in the Town
of Marathon and Village of Marathon. (b) Route 11 between the exit ramp of the
southbound lane of IR 81 and Route 13 in the City of Cortland and in the Town
of Cortlandville. (c) Route 41. Route 41 between Route 26 and I-81 in the Towns of Cincinnatus, Freetown, Solon, and Cortlandville and in the Village of McGraw. (d) Route 13. Route 13 between the

Cortland/Thompkins county line and Church Street in the City of

Cortland. (e) I-81 connector
(930Q). Route 930Q between I-81 (exit 12) and Route 281. (f) [Eff. until Sept. 2,1998, see also subd. (f) below.] Route 281. Route 281 between I-81 (930Q) and back entrance to

Groton Avenue Plaza, a distance of 2.3 miles. (f) [Eff. Sept. 2,1998, see also subd. (f)
above.] Route 281 between I-81 (930Q) and Route 13. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8111.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
